summary: Diff implements Europe-wide + international destination marketing copy (including UK/USA/Canada/Italy/and more) across key components/pages, adds a prominent desktop “Contact Us” header CTA linking to /contact, and updates ContactDetails to default to the known footer email/phone when backend data is unavailable.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a “Website” row to the Contact Information panel with a fallback placeholder value (“www.business-website.com”).
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-19 only requested removing placeholder defaults for email/phone and defaulting them to the known business values; it did not request adding/displaying a website field or introducing a website placeholder.
